ebay_trending.product: Retro Gaming Consoles & Accessories (SNES, N64, PS1)
ebay_trending.tip: Source from charity shops and car boot sales. Clean, boxed units fetch premium. Listings with original cables convert best.
Check charity shops and clearance stores. Retired sets appreciate. Incomplete sets sell for parts â€” list individual bags/minifigs.
Nike, Adidas, Fila from charity shops. Use keywords: 'vintage', 'y2k', 'deadstock'. Flat-lay photos on clean background perform best.

ebay_trending.product: Smart Home Devices (Echo, Ring, Hue â€“ Used)
ebay_trending.tip: People upgrade frequently. Source refurbished bundles. Reset and test before listing. Bundle compatible devices for higher AOV.
Recent AI books sell fast. Source wholesale or charity shops. Bundle 3-book lots for Â£30+. Niche topic, low competition.

fiverr_gigs.gig_title: I will fix your WordPress website errors and speed it up
fiverr_gigs.tip: Focus on '1 day delivery' as your hook. Most clients panic about broken sites. Offer 3-tier: basic fix / full audit / monthly retainer.

fiverr_gigs.gig_title: I will create professional eBay listings with SEO-optimised titles
fiverr_gigs.tip: Offer bulk discounts (10 listings, 25 listings). Include photo editing tips in delivery. Upsell monthly listing management.

fiverr_gigs.gig_title: I will set up your AI workflow using ChatGPT or Claude
fiverr_gigs.tip: Huge demand in early 2026. Target small business owners. Offer Notion + AI, email templates + AI, or social media automation.

fiverr_gigs.gig_title: I will write engaging tech/AI content for your blog or website
fiverr_gigs.tip: Leverage your AI knowledge. Offer SEO-optimised articles. Use AI to assist drafts, add your voice. 500/1000/2000 word tiers.

fiverr_gigs.gig_title: I will advise on basic PC or laptop repairs and upgrades remotely
fiverr_gigs.tip: Low volume but loyal clients. Upsell to ongoing 'tech friend' retainer. Target non-techies via Google/Facebook ads targeting older demographics.

upwork_opportunities.title: WordPress Maintenance & Plugin Management
upwork_opportunities.tip: Create a strong profile with before/after screenshots. Niche down to WooCommerce or blog sites. Respond to posts within 1 hour for 3x invite rate.

upwork_opportunities.title: eBay Store Management & Listing Optimisation
upwork_opportunities.tip: Many UK/US sellers need ongoing help. Propose a recurring contract after first project. Show understanding of eBay algorithm and cassini search.

upwork_opportunities.title: AI Prompt Engineer & Workflow Consultant
upwork_opportunities.tip: One of the fastest-growing Upwork categories in 2026. Build a portfolio of 3 example workflows. Position as 'AI assistant for your business'.

upwork_opportunities.title: Virtual Assistant â€“ Tech-Savvy (Admin + Research)
upwork_opportunities.tip: Easy entry point to Upwork. Land first client at lower rate, get review, then raise. Many clients want long-term VAs â€” pitch reliability.

upwork_opportunities.title: Technical Content Writer â€“ AI, SaaS, WordPress
upwork_opportunities.tip: Your unique angle: you actually use the tools you write about. Mention @prompttocide if you have published videos â€” builds trust instantly.
